Pra você que gosta de uma aventura, que: For you who like an adventure, how about trying to rappel down the bridge with friends? It's about 30 meters high, on one of the most beautiful viaducts in São Paulo, perfect for a radical activity, which also has the option of going down accompanied by an instructor or going down alone being monitored.
Vamos de trilha? O Parque Estadual da Ca: Shall we go on the trail? Cantareira State Park has one of the largest areas of native tropical forest in the world, housing animals and plant species threatened with extinction. Including 4 trails, the one that stands out is the Pedra Grande Trail, as it has the longest route, 30ft (round trip), where its high point is Pedra Grande, which provides a wonderful view.
Huum... bateu aquela fome? Que tal dar: Hmm... hit that hunger? How about stopping by the Jurassic Park Burger restaurant? A themed and relaxed burger joint, bringing several references from the movie and several fun snacks. The place also has vegan and vegetarian options.
Bora de diversão? A Casa de Pedra é um ó: Have fun? Casa de Pedra is a great place to go rock climbing and have fun with the crowd. A great way to bond and venture into a multi-activity gymnasium.
Pra você que adora atividades radicais,: For you who love extreme activities, how about going to the Sports Center? The place is perfect to spend energy, with circuits, skating rinks, pump tracks and much more.
Que tal umas manobras? O Skate Park do C: How about some maneuvers? Chuvisco Skate Park is a great place to venture out and make new friends, an environment with several different tracks and even some sports courts.
Conhecer São Paulo pedalando? Sim, é pos: Experience cycling in São Paulo? Yes, it is possible! The Bike Tour SP provides a tour of the city using only bicycles, it is better they are electric. There are several itineraries, we recommend the one in the Vila Madalena neighborhood for you to have a very cool experience and venture out there. The tours are also viable for the elderly, children, people with reduced mobility and Libras speakers.
Bora comer um pouquinho? O Quintal deBet: Would you like to eat a little? Quintal deBetti is a great place to relax and delight in a pleasant, quiet and comfortable environment. Good for to have that Happy Hour with the guys and eat delicious dishes, from hamburgers to that barbecue.
Eita gelo!! A Arena Ice Brasil é perfeit: Jeez ice!! Arena Ice Brasil is perfect for imitating that movie scene andskating on ice haha is a great place to have fun and experience new activities, such as, for example, practice Hockey or learn Curling. The space also has the possibility of renting the place to celebrate birthdays or Happy Hours ;)
Eu ouvi comida exótica? Sim!! Bora se av: Did I hear exotic food? Yea!! Let's venture into food then? Tantra Restaurant is a different environment, with an incredible decoration. The dishes are based on Asian and aphrodisiac cuisine, with the possibility for customers to prepare their own food on a griddle. Among the eccentricities, there are buffalo, shark and wild boar meats, but don't worry, there is a very exotic plant-based menu too, from mango flambéed with spices to chickpeas smoked in bamboo. If you think you stopped there, you were wrong, the place still offers attractions such as Egyptian dancing with a 3-meter snake and shiatsu massage.
É inovador e revolucionário? Sim!! O Mus: Is it innovative and revolutionary? Yes!! The Museu de Arte de São Paulo Assis Chateaubriand can be an incredible option for those looking to appreciate highly recognized works, in addition to being one of the best-known spots in the city of São Paulo!
O Sesc Pompeia pode ser uma ótima opção: Sesc Pompeia can be a great option for you who are looking for a place full of artistic and cultural attractions, as well as offering several spaces such as: libraries, areas for work activities and much more!
É muito bonito. É muito silencioso e eu: It's very beautiful. It's very quiet and I L-O-V-E-D! Terraço Itália is ideal for you who are looking for a different place to eat and enjoy. It has four different environments for you to select the ideal one for your occasion.
Do meu ponto de vista pessoal, vou dizer: From my personal point of view, I will say: IT IS A MASTERPIECE! The São Paulo Cultural Center is a great option for those looking for places full of diversity and culture. With a modern and contemporary air, the environment offers several programs for all tastes, in addition to having four libraries full of books!
Huum... que tal uma refeição diferenciad: Hmm... how about a differentiated meal? Esther Rooftop is a modern space perfect for enjoying gourmet dishes and cocktails. It has a wonderful view and a balcony with retractable awning. The restaurant also offers the option of having a complete vegetarian meal.
Contêineres? Isso mesmo!! O Teatro dos C: Containers? That's right!! Teatro dos Contêineres is an ideal cultural and social space to give that diversified experience. A differentiated environment that has exhibitions, presentations and shows, where artistic and cultural experimentation can be found.
Um achadinho? Siiim!! O Jardim da Prefei: A little find? Yesss!! The City Hall Garden is a place still little known, it is suspended in a 14-story building, preserving about 400 species of fruit trees, plants and medicinal herbs. A very calm, relaxing environment, perfect for a peaceful stroll.
Todes prontes para uma mistura de conexõ: All ready for a mix of diverse connections? Casa Elefante brings together workshops, soirees, exhibitions and pocket shows. A space for artistic and social coexistence, with a vinyl record store, books, thrift store and even a cafe/bar.
Já pensou em assistir aquele filmezinho: Have you ever thought about watching that little movie comfortably? Cinesala provides this for you! The films that are doing well, but in a much more cozy atmosphere than in ordinary cinemas. One of the few street cinemas in the city, with comfortable armchairs and sofas, it really feels like you're at home.
Olha essas formas e cores!! O Instituto: Look at those shapes and colors!! Instituto Tomie Ohtake is a cultural center that hosts exhibitions of contemporary art encompassing different styles and languages, with samples of plastic arts, architecture and design. In addition, activities such as debates, workshops and courses take place. The building also has a restaurant.
E voltamos de novo com aquela 'Ô, sol vê: And we're back again with that 'Oh, sun, see if you don't forget...'. Ibirapuera Park is an excellent choice for those looking for a beautiful place that conveys peace, warmth and comfort. In addition to offering the park as a major attraction, Ibirapuera also contains the Ibirapuera Auditorium - Oscar Niemeyer, Afro Brasil Museum and a Planetarium!
URRUUU!! Eu ouvi fãs?? A Galeria do Rock: WOOOOO!! I heard fans?? Galeria do Rock is a great option for those looking for a place full of news, band shirts and a strong personality. With several stores gathered in the environment, the Gallery has a wide diversity for audiences of all ages.
Bateu aquela vontade de conhecer um luga: Did you hit that urge to know a new place and still find wonderful street food? Calçadão Urbanoid is a gastronomic space with a variety of options, you can fill your belly with pizzas, hamburgers, crepes, drinks, vegetarian and vegan foods, and you will still be enjoying great music!
BI, BI, BI!!! São os food trucks da Vila: Beep! Beep!!! It's the Vila Mascote food trucks coming to your itinerary! Vila Mascote Food Park brings together a series of food trucks with a variety of food and beverage options. A relaxed and great place to meet new people.
Um túnel? Isso mesmo! O MIRA é um cantin: A tunnel? That's right! MIRA is a multicultural corner that brings together art, gastronomy, fairs and workshops, all in one place. The space also has an observatory with co-working and wi-fi that can be used for free. The place is organized by amazing women, not to mention that the restaurant buys its ingredients from small producers.
Mix, mix, mix... O Tokyo 011 é um prédio: Mix, mix, mix... Tokyo 011 is a 9-story modernist building that has a little bit of everything. There you will find a dance floor, theater, karaoke, movie theaters, restaurant and even exhibitions. Phew... lots of things in, cultural events, activities to have fun and party.
Olha laranjaaa, olha a melanciaaa!!! O M: Look at the orange, look at the watermelon!!! The São Paulo Market could not be left out of this itinerary. An environment where you will find different foods, from a super different fruit, to the most varied cheeses and wines. The best part is that you can taste everything while walking a lot.
Quero agitação!!! O bar Eu Tu Eles é um: I want excitement!!! The Eu Tu Eles bar is a relaxed and super fun atmosphere, with live music, snacks and exotic caipirinhas (there's even a caipinha de pot, can this, production?). The drinks are as colorful and beautiful as the place.
Ai que fofaaa!! A Casa das Rosas traz aq: Oh how cute!! Casa das Rosas brings that classic French style and a beautiful rose garden. Perfect environment to spend that quiet afternoon and catch up with friends. A beautiful mansion that has a poetry library and a wonderful cafe.
Tuts, tuts!!! O Caixote Bar é perfeito p: Tuts tuts!!! The Caixote Bar is perfect for those who love a hustle. An environment that mixes music, art and gastronomy, a true urban mix. A relaxed and perfect space to enjoy a good conversation.
STRIKE!!! Pra você que tá afim de curtir: STRIKE!!! For you who want to enjoy a bowling with the guys and guarantee the highest score by making several strikes, it's worth visiting Boliche Villa Bowling!
OLHA O DADO ROLANDOOO E O MESTRE NARRAND: LOOK AT THE ROLLING DICE AND THE MASTER NARRATING ANOTHER STORY! Ludus Luderia is a bar that contains card and board games. There you have good food and a repertoire of more than 1000 board games, in addition to video games of course.
O Beco do Batman é uma travessa localiza: Beco do Batman is an alley located close to Vila Madalena, a bohemian neighborhood on the west side of the city of São Paulo. The place is full of colorful and attractive graffiti for you to make a beautiful photo shoot (amateur or not). The ride also gives access to several other cool places around Vila Madalena.
POIN, POIN, vamos dar uns pulinhos por a: POIN, POIN, let's hop around?! Impulso Park is a trampoline amusement park that guarantees a new experience for all ages.
Desafio sobre rodas! O Roller Jam é um a: Challenge on wheels! Roller Jam is a fun and relaxed environment for those who want to learn (or not) to skate. Visitors can bring their own skates (any model) or rent the 'Quad' models - those with 4 parallel wheels.
Bora voar? Pra você que não é tão aventu: Let's fly? For you who are not so adventurous, but like to experience new things, iFly provides that. You will fly inside a wind tunnel with technology developed by NASA.
Vamos diversificar? O Itaú Cultural é um: Shall we diversify? Itaú Cultural is a place that promotes exhibitions, scenic and musical shows, in addition to having a library and an auditorium for courses and seminars. The space is beautiful and has a super instagrammable staircase.
Uma vibe de praia? Siim!! Isso é o que o: A beach vibe? Yes!! This is what Bar Pitico promotes. With beach chairs and scattered greenery, the environment is a great place to meet with the crowd and have that Happy Hour. In addition, Rua Guaicuí, where the bar is located, is full of other super cool places to visit.
Zuuuum! É o maior kart center do Brasil: Whoa! It is the biggest kart center in Brazil coming to your itinerary. The Speedland is perfect for getting back to that childhood feeling and picking up speed on the track. In addition to kart racing, the space also has an arcade, kart simulators and a museum dedicated to driver Ayrton Senna.
Bora dar uma de princesa Merida e atirar: Let's play princess Merida and shoot some arrows? The Willi Willie Bar is very much like a movie, a super fun environment, with live music and broadcasting of sporting events. Perfect to spend time with the guys having that little drink with snacks while practicing archery.
Que experiência, simultaneamente, avassa: What an experience, at the same time, overwhelming, fascinating and traveling! Escape 60 is an diferente experience among the crowd, lived in a mysterious environment and specially designed to sharpen your skills and intelligence. You will be locked in a room and given an hour to decipher codes, solve puzzles and find your way out. You and your team have never seen anything like it!
'Eu mirei na lua e acabei acertando as e: 'I aimed for the moon and ended up hitting the stars...' The Planetarium of Ibirapuera Aristotle Orsini was the first planetarium open to the public to be opened in Brazil, back in 1957! The space is beautiful and offers an amazing immersive astronomical experience! The attractions change constantly, it's worth checking their website to stay tuned!
Que isso, um filme? Até poderia ser, ma: What is it, a movie? It could be, but it's actually another cool place for your itinerary ;) Taverna Medieval is a themed hamburger restaurant with Middle Ages decor, artisanal food and costumed waiters. A wide and playful space for you to have fun with the guys. Ah, a spoiler, the forest elves prepare a vegan burger option and the drinks are beyond wonderful.
Que tal um pouco de conhecimento, hein??: How about a little knowledge, huh?? The Museu Catavento is one of the best known in the city of São Paulo and offers four incredible immersive sections that guarantee fun and learning for the public. The sections are: universe, life, ingenuity and society.
Alicia Keys que nos perdoe, mas este aqu: Alicia Keys forgive us, but this one is from São Paulo! Inspired by the Empire State, the Farol Santander building is one of the tallest in the country, a postcard of the city and even has a viewpoint at the top! Beautiful inside and out: Farol Santander has a wide range of constantly changing exhibitions.
Uma viagem espacial? A hamburgueria Burg: A space trip? Burger Espacial is perfect for working your imagination and having fun. A universe-themed environment and impeccable decor. The snacks have really cool names and are very different, oh there's a vegetarian option too.
Olha esses tijolinhos... A Pinacoteca é: Look at those little bricks... The Pinacoteca is a great place to see a little more about art and culture, all in a wonderful environment. The place has incredible exhibitions, in addition to having a cafe with a beautiful view of the garden. Ah, one more tip, prefer to go by the Luz subway station to have one more point to appreciate.
Eu ouvi antiguidade? A Praça Benedito Ca: Did I hear antiquity? Praça Benedito Calixto is perfect for those who love a fair with works of art and antiques, as well as typical foods of course. A charming square that has more than 300 handicraft exhibitors. Ah, around the square there are several galleries and bars for you to continue exploring. Remembering that the fair takes place only on Saturdays.
MEU DEUS, É MUITO ALTO!!! O Edifício Mar: OH MY GOD IT'S TOO HIGH!!! The Martinelli Building is perfect to have that view from above of São Paulo. Have you ever thought about contemplating the city from a terrace over 100 meters high? It is possible through the first skyscraper built in the locality.
Há-há-há, Hi-hi-hi, eu não consigo parar: Ha-ha-ha, Hi-hi-hi, I can't stop laughing... That's right, let's bring a circus-themed restaurant to your script. A wonderful atmosphere, with incredible decor and delicious food, from a red velvet cake milkshake to a filet mion mincemeat.
Os preços dos hambúrgueres variam entre: The prices of hamburgers range from BRL 25.00 to BRL 45.00.
Os passeios privativos custam R$ 200,00,: Private tours cost BRL 200.00, but there are also free tours, which only ask for the donation of 4.41 lb of non-perishable food.

Os preços dos pratos variam entre R$ 22,: The prices of the dishes vary between BRL 22.00 and BRL 90.00.
Varia de R$25,00 a R$50,00, mas há, tamb: It varies from BRL 25.00 to BRL 50.00, but there is also free entrance on Tuesdays.
Não temos preços a respeito dessa instit: We don't have prices for this institution yet.
Para duas pessoas, varia de R$400,00 a R: For two people, it varies from BRL 400.00 to BRL 1200.00.
Variado, mas no almoço, por exemplo, o m: Varied, but at lunch, for example, the executive menu with three steps costs around BRL 79.00.
O espaço possui eventos gratuitos e os i: The space has free events and paid tickets cost about BRL 30.00 the entire entry.
Entrada gratuita, pagamento somente se c: Free entry, payment only if you consume or buy something.
It varies between BRL 24.00 and BRL 45.00.
Entrada gratuita, somente algumas exposi: Free admission, only some exhibitions are paid.
Entrance to the park is free.
Entrada gratuita, pagamento somente nas: Free entry, payment only on your purchases in stores.
Entrada gratuita, você só paga o que con: Free entry, you only pay for what you consume.
Free entry, you only pay for what you consume or use.
Entrada gratuita, você só paga pelo que: Free entry, you only pay for what you buy.

It varies between BRL 5.00 and BRL 70.00.

Os passaportes de entrada variam entre R: Entry passports range from BRL 200.00 to BRL 390.00.
